name: 名稱
Loading gear automatically from the game: 自動從遊戲內導入裝備
1. Install requirements from the instruc: 1. 根據 Github 上的說明安裝所需的運行環境
2. Leave your emulator open, and close E: 2. 保持你的模擬器開啓, 退出第七史詩
4. Open Epic 7, and load into the lobby: 4. 打開第七史詩, 並進入裝備界麵
Wait up to 30 secs, then once the data a: 等待 30 秒左右, 直到數據出現, 點擊
8. Go to the Gear tab, and use the Level: 8. 前往裝備列錶, 使用 等級 = 0 過濾器手動解決等級為0的裝備導入問題
After the 'gear.txt' is created, choose: 在 'gear.txt' 生成後, 選擇下麵任何一種方式導入數據, 然後選擇 'gear.txt' 文件.
to completely replace any existing gear: 用新截圖數據覆蓋舊數據. 這會清空你的英雄列錶.
to add your new gear screenshots to your: 新增裝備數據. 不會清空英雄列錶.
Merging replaces your old items with new: 合並會將舊裝備數據更新, 同時保持英雄穿著裝備不變.
This is useful for people who re-screens: 這對於重新截圖所有裝備並希望保留所有英雄配置的人很有用.
Save/Load all optimizer data: 保存/加載全部優化器數據
You can load/save your hero + gear confi: 你可以在此加載/保存你的英雄和裝備設置
Creating gear data from screenshots: 通過截圖導入裝備數據
Hit 'Choose Folder', navigate into the f: 點擊 '選擇文件夾' 到截圖所在的文件夾, 然後點擊'上傳'. （該文件夾應顯示為空，隻需選擇它即可）
截圖後, 點擊 '導出'. 這將在您安裝該應用程序的文件夾中生成 'gear.txt'.
Import gear from Zarroc optimizer: 從Zarroc優化器中導入裝備數據
在此選擇Zarroc優化器數據文件
Use rage set bonus for damage optimizati: 計算傷害時考慮憤怒套加成
Choose the desired main stats for access: Choose the desired main stats for accessories. Multiple options can be selected per slot.
Choose the desired gear sets. Multiple o: Choose the desired gear sets. Multiple options can be selected per slot. The first slot must be either only 4 piece or 2 piece sets.
Choose any sets you don't want included: Choose any sets you don't want included in the search.
Select substat filters to filter results: Select substat filters to filter results by. Left column is min (inclusive) and right column is max (inclusive).
Select rating filters to filter results: Select rating filters to filter results by. Ratings are stats that aren't seen in the game, but are useful for comparing builds.  Left column is min (inclusive) and right column is max (inclusive).
Combat power, as you would find it ingam: Combat power, as you would find it ingame, but without factoring in skill enhances. Useful for workd boss units.
Hp * Speed rating, for comparing fast/he: Hp * Speed rating, for comparing fast/health builds, disregaring defense. Example health scaling units: Krau, Fceci.
Effective Hp, for comparing how much dam: Effective Hp, for comparing how much damage a unit can take. Formula: HP * (Defense/300 + 1).
Effective Hp * Speed rating, for compari: Effective Hp * Speed rating, for comparing fast/tanky builds.
Average damage rating, measures how much: Average damage rating, measures how much damage your unit will deal on average, factoring in crit chance & damage.
Average damage * Speed rating, measures: Average damage * Speed rating, measures average damage vs speed.
Max crit damage rating, measures damage: Max crit damage rating, measures damage at 100% crit chance. Example units: Arby, JKise.
Max crit damage * Speed rating, measures: Max crit damage * Speed rating, measures damage at 100% crit chance vs speed.
Dmg * Hp rating, average damage rating,: Dmg * Hp rating, average damage rating, scaled by your units health. Useful for HP scaling bruisers.
Number items to upgrade - including refo: Number items to upgrade - including reforges and enhances.
Sum of gear score of all 6 pieces.
This is the most useful filter but pleas: This is the most useful filter but please read before using it. Using this wrong can exclude good results from the search.
Assign a priority to each substat type f: Assign a priority to each substat type from -1 to 3. This will go through every gear, and calculates the # of max rolls of each stat.
The # of rolls is then multiplied by the: The # of rolls is then multiplied by the stat priority you chose. It adds up all the stat scores for a gear, and sorts your gear by their highest substat score.
After that, it chooses only the Top X% o: After that, it chooses only the Top X% of scored gears to use for the search.
For example, if you select Atk: 3 / Cr:: For example, if you select Atk: 3 / Cr: 3 / Cd: 3 / Top 40%, this will use only the best 40% of your gears sorted by Atk / Cr / Cd substats.
This filter does nothing when Top X% is: This filter does nothing when Top X% is 100.
I find 40-50% to be a good range to star: I find 40-50% to be a good range to start with, and adjust the Top X% lower/higher based on your own gear and the results you get.
Lowering the percent narrows down your b: Lowering the percent narrows down your best gears to make the search faster, but going too low will exclude possible good builds and will be less optimal.
This works best when accessory stats and: This works best when accessory stats and set options are selected.
Select the hero you want to optimize.
The left shows your unit's current stats: The left shows your unit's current stats. The middle shows the stats after the stat change. Right side shows the difference.
Predict the reforged stats on +15 level: Predict the reforged stats on +15 level 85 gear to use in the search. Warning: the substat prediction is not always accurate.
Search only for builds that contain all: Search only for builds that contain all +15 and reforged gear.
Allow locked items in the search.
Allow items equipped by other heroes in: Allow items equipped by other heroes in the search.
Keep any existing gears on the unit, and: Keep any existing gears on the unit, and search only for the missing gear pieces.
Ignores the dropdown selected units' cur: Ignores the dropdown selected units' currently equipped gear in optimization. Only works when 'Equipped items' is checked.
Shows how many pieces of gear will be us: Shows how many pieces of gear will be used in the search, after filters are applied.
If you notice for example, you only have: If you notice for example, you only have 2 rings being used, try expanding your filters to use more ring options. Or if you see too much gear being used, reduce your Top % filter to be more selective.
Number of permutations of the filtered g: Number of permutations of the filtered gear that need to be searched.
Make this number lower to make searches: Make this number lower to make searches faster, but you will be searching less options.
Number of search results that satisfy th: Number of search results that satisfy the stat filters.
There is a maximum of 5,000,000 results: There is a maximum of 5,000,000 results before the search stops (for memory limitations).
Equips/Unequip the current selected gear: Equips/Unequip the current selected gears onto your hero. Automatically saves the build.
Locks/Unlocks the current selected gears: Locks/Unlocks the current selected gears that you want to be excluded from other searches.
Select/Deselects all the items. You can: Select/Deselects all the items. You can manually check/uncheck each checkbox as well.
Saves/Removes the currently selected row: Saves/Removes the currently selected row as a build. This will mark it with a star, and the build will be visible on the Heroes tab.
View and edit gears here. Multiple gears: View and edit gears here. Multiple gears can be selected with Ctrl + click or Shift + click. The number of selected gear can be found in the top right corner.
This score measures how well your gear r: This score measures how well your gear rolled, scaled by the max roll for 85 gear (assuming 4 for speed).
Similar to WSS, except flat stats rolls: Similar to WSS, except flat stats rolls are included. Flat stats account to percentage equivalent was determined using the average stats of 5* units divided by the average flat roll.
By this metric, a single flat roll corre: By this metric, a single flat roll corresponds to ~3.5 Atk %, ~5.0 Def %, ~3.1 Hp %.
dScore - DPS Score. This is the Score fo: dScore - DPS Score. This is the Score formula but only counting Attack/%, Crit Chance, Crit Damage, and Speed.
sScore - Support Score. This is the Scor: sScore - Support Score. This is the Score formula but only counting Hp/%, Defense/%, Effect Resist, and Speed.
cScore - Combat Score. This is the Score: cScore - Combat Score. This is the Score formula excluding Effectiveness and Effect Resist.
Edit Selected Item - Change an items sta: Edit Selected Item - Change an items stats, levels, or equip it onto someone.
Reforge Item - Only works on +15 level 8: Reforge Item - Only works on +15 level 85 gears, predicts the item's reforged stats and generates the edited version.
Add New Item - Create a new item and fil: Add New Item - Create a new item and fill in its stats.
Duplicate Item - Create a copy of the se: Duplicate Item - Create a copy of the selected item and lets you change its stats.
Remove Items - Unequips and then deletes: Remove Items - Unequips and then deletes the items. Multiple selection enabled.
Unequip Items - Unequips the items from: Unequip Items - Unequips the items from their units. Multiple selection enabled.
Lock/Unlock Items - Locks/Unlocks the it: Lock/Unlock Items - Locks/Unlocks the items that you want to be excluded from searches.
Select filters to filter the gear table: Select filters to filter the gear table by. Only one filter allowed per section for now.
Use the Duplicates filter to find gear w: Use the Duplicates filter to find gear with the same stats, and remove if they were mistakenly added.
Mercenary Helga: 自由自在的傭兵赫爾嘉
